description:
An open source, decentralized package manager, to automate building and sharing of packages


- Feature: Add --force option to conan remote auth to force authentication even for remotes that have anonymous access enabled. ( Docs: :page_with_curl:
- Feature: Add --output option to conan new command. (
- Feature: Let the new CMakeDeps always define components and check them with find_package( COMPONENTS), listening to new property cmake_components. (
- Feature: Allow tools.microsoft.msbuild:max_cpu_count=0 to use /m to use all available cores. ( Docs: :page_with_curl:
- Feature: define * as default argument if no args specified for conan list. ( Docs: :page_with_curl:
- Feature: Improved auto deduce location function. (
- Feature: BazelDeps using the new deduce_location mechanism to find the libraries. (
- Feature: Initial conan workspace initial proposal to manage local set of editables. Introduced only as a dev/maintainers feature, behind an environment variable. ( Docs: :page_with_curl:
- Feature: Allow --settings in conan config install-pkg to create and install different configurations in different platforms. ( Docs: :page_with_curl:
- Feature: Add network to configfile for Docker runners. ( Docs: :page_with_curl:
- Fix: Fix help message for PowerShell conf. ( Docs: :page_with_curl:
- Fix: Fixed an error that occurred when using conan.tools.scm.Git.fetch_commit() in a subfolder. (
- Fix: Adding a "risk" warning for options conflicts, so users can do warn-as-error to raise when they happen. (
- Fix: New CMakeDeps generator allow fooConfig.cmake for in-package files besides foo-config.cmake. (
- Fix: Add a warning for editable dependencies when building in the cache. (
- Fix: Raise ConanException if source patch does not exist in export_conandata_patches. (
- Fix: Improve the UX for CONAN_LOG_LEVEL env-var incorrect values. (
- Fix: Meson aligns with other build systems considering x86_64->x86 as cross building. (
- Fix: Avoid colorama bug crashing for large outputs. (
- Fix: Fix arch for docker runner tests. ( Docs: :page_with_curl:
- Bugfix: Add correct flags when compiler=clang and compiler_executables={"c": "clang-cl"} to not inject incorrect flags when cross-building from Linux to Windows. (
- Bugfix: Solve Choco().check() bug using legacy choco search --local-only, replaced by choco list. (
- Bugfix: Fix adding tools.android:ndk_path with spaces in path. (
- BugFix: Fix Premake integration. ( Docs: :page_with_curl:
- Bugfix: Solve problem with misdetection of consumer packages for the & pattern. (
- Bugfix: Fix conan graph info ... -f=html in Safari. (
- Bugfix: Allow multiple [replace_requires] by the same dependency. (
- Bugfix: BazelDeps failed to find OpenSSL shared libraries. (
- Bugfix: Solve bug in CMake not using the correct value from tools.microsoft.msbuild:max_cpu_count. (
- Bugfix: Fix cpp_info properties overwriting instead of merging for properties with list values. Necessary for cmake_build_modules to work in editable mode. (
